Deceptively light, the blade rasps through castle-forged plate as easily as Corellon Larethian's own anarchic holy sword through the hearts of evil ores.

BG3 Larethian's Wrath Information

Razor Gale Swing your weapon in a cyclone of steel that deals razorblade-sharp damage to all enemies within range. Range: 1.5m
